hh3cDisk.name: hh3cDisk
hh3cDisk.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cDisk.description: This MIB describes the general information of disk device, include the running status, disk interface, and chche management.

hh3cDiskTable.name: hh3cDiskTable
hh3cDiskTable.description: This table contains some entity extend information of the disk.

hh3cDiskEntry.name: hh3cDiskEntry
hh3cDiskEntry.description: An entry containing management information applicable to the disk.

hh3cDiskIndex.name: hh3cDiskIndex
hh3cDiskIndex.description: This object identifies the entity index of disk. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of entPhysicalIndex.

hh3cDiskPortType.name: hh3cDiskPortType
hh3cDiskPortType.description: This object describes the interface type of disk. The value 'sata' means serial advanced technology attachment. The value 'pata' means parallel advanced technology attachment. The value 'sas' means serial attached SCSI. The value 'scsi' means small computer system interface. The value 'ieee1394' means a type of bus standard. The value 'fcal' means fiber channel arbitrated loop.

hh3cDiskPortSpeed.name: hh3cDiskPortSpeed
hh3cDiskPortSpeed.description: This object identifies the speed of disk interface. The units is million bytes per second.

hh3cDiskSize.name: hh3cDiskSize
hh3cDiskSize.description: This object describes the size of disk's total space. The units is million bytes.

hh3cDiskFreeSpace.name: hh3cDiskFreeSpace
hh3cDiskFreeSpace.description: This object describes the size of spare space of the disk. The units is million bytes.

hh3cDiskLocationState.name: hh3cDiskLocationState
hh3cDiskLocationState.description: This object identifies if the led used to confirm the position of disk is enable.

hh3cDiskRunLedState.name: hh3cDiskRunLedState
hh3cDiskRunLedState.description: This object identifies the runing state of the disk. The value of 'on' means the blue led is on, and the disk works well. The value of 'blink' means the blue led is blinking, and the disk is being readed or writed. The value of 'fastblink' means the blue led is blinking very fast, and the disk is being located. This object can not be 'fastblink' when the value of associated hh3cDiskLocationState object is equal to 'disable'.

hh3cDiskFaultLedState.name: hh3cDiskFaultLedState
hh3cDiskFaultLedState.description: This object identifies the fault state of the disk. The value of 'off' means the yellow led is go out, and the disk works well. The value of 'on' means the yellow led is on, and the disk break down. The value of 'blink' means the yellow led is blinking, and a group of raid disk is being synchronized.

hh3cDiskInitialize.name: hh3cDiskInitialize
hh3cDiskInitialize.description: The operation of initialize the disk. When the value of this object is set to 'action', the operation of disk initialize are touched off.

hh3cDiskGlobalSpare.name: hh3cDiskGlobalSpare
hh3cDiskGlobalSpare.description: This object identifies if the disk is a global hot spare disk. The value 'globalSpare' means it is a global spare disk, and the value 'nonglobalSpare' means not.

hh3cDiskLocalSpare.name: hh3cDiskLocalSpare
hh3cDiskLocalSpare.description: This object identifies if the disk is a specific hot spare disk. The value 'localSpare' means it is a local spare disk, and 'nonlocalSpare' means not.

hh3cDiskReadCache.name: hh3cDiskReadCache
hh3cDiskReadCache.description: This object identifies the state of read cache.

hh3cDiskWriteCache.name: hh3cDiskWriteCache
hh3cDiskWriteCache.description: This object identifies the state of write cache.

hh3cDiskPowerOffReason.name: hh3cDiskPowerOffReason
hh3cDiskPowerOffReason.description: This object describes the reason of disk poweroff. The value 'environmentUnstable' means disk poweroff and may poweron again. The value 'mediumError' means disk poweroff and never poweron. The value 'smartCheckError' means disk's SMART check failed and poweroff. The value 'generalError' means disk poweroff because of general error.
